title: What the meaning of RED dq in .data?
content:
I'm new to IDA.

Refer here: Red text Highlight in IDA Pro

But I can't find any useful in Problem Window.

answers_data.content: In this case, auto-analysis has decided that the QWORDs at those locations should be displayed as pointers, but the concrete data value, 0, is not a valid pointer within the binary's address space.
